{"step_by_step_thinking": "Dental auxiliary materials are substances that are used in the process of dental work. Dental impression wax is used to take impressions of the teeth and gums. Ceramic is used in the creation of crowns, bridges, and veneers. Casting investment is used in the process of creating metal frameworks for things like crowns and bridges. Impression compound is also used to take impressions of the teeth and gums. Therefore, all of these are used in dental procedures.", "answer_choice": "None of the above"}
